::Description::


Metal Gear Rising: Revengeance - a joint project of the legendary 
creator of the Metal Gear saga and famous studio Platinum Games.


::System Requirements::

Processor: Intel Core i5 2400 
Memory: 2 GB RAM

Hard Drive: 25 GB available space 
Sound Card: DirectX compatible sound card


::Installation Steps::


1) Download the torrent.

2) Install the game via Setup.

3) Copy the NoDVD Contents in the main game directory where installed.

4) Play

5) Support the Developers.


::Greetz and Respect::
